description: Lists all cost allocation tags currently on the named resource. A cost allocation tag is a key-value pair where the key is case-sensitive and the value is optional. You can use cost allocation tags to categorize and track your AWS costs. If the cluster is not in the available state, ListTagsForResource returns an error. You can have a maximum of 50 cost allocation tags on an ElastiCache resource. For more information, see Monitoring Costs with Tags.
